text: The Hume Highway exits and major intersections are spread across the Australian states of New South Wales and Victoria. The Hume Highway national route is divided into four sections comprising, from north to south, urban stretches of the highway in Sydney, a motorway from the outskirts of Sydney to the Southern Highlands, a grade-separated highway in regional New South Wales, and a freeway throughout Victoria. ==In New South Wales== ===Hume Highway in Sydney=== ===Hume Motorway=== ===Hume Highway in regional areas=== ==In Victoria== ===Hume Freeway=== ==See also== *Highways in Australia *List of highways in New South Wales *List of highways in Victoria ==References== *
title: Hume Highway exits and interchanges
